20101221140351.000|20101221140353.000|CC1|THIS AREA IS VERY ROCKY.        
20101221140353.000|20101221140355.000|CC1|IT'S GOT STEEP TERRAIN.         
20101221140355.000|20101221140357.000|CC1|AND NESTLED ALL ALONG THE       
20101221140357.000|20101221140359.000|CC1|STEEPER RAIN ARE HUNDREDS AND   
20101221140359.000|20101221140400.000|CC1|HUNDREDS OF HOMES.

20101221140405.000|20101221140406.000|CC1|MIXED IN WITH THE DIRT.         
20101221140406.000|20101221140408.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT THE CONCERN IS, THE 
20101221140408.000|20101221140408.000|CC1|MUD.

20101221140409.000|20101221140411.000|CC1|THEY HAVE TRIED TO FORTIFY THEIR
20101221140411.000|20101221140412.000|CC1|HOMES BY BUILDING THESE

20101221140415.000|20101221140418.000|CC1|AGAINST GUARDRAILS, K RAILS     
20101221140418.000|20101221140419.000|CC1|POLES AND PLYWOOD.              
20101221140419.000|20101221140421.000|CC1|YOU'LL REMEMBER BACK IN 2009 THE

20101221140425.000|20101221140427.000|CC1|THOUSANDS AND THOUSANDS OF ACRES

20101221140437.000|20101221140439.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN POUNDING RAIN SINCE

20101221140617.000|20101221140618.000|CC1|WEDNESDAY MORNING.

20101221140622.000|20101221140624.000|CC1|BUT EVEN WHEN THEY GET BACK UP

20101221140626.000|20101221140629.000|CC1|NEARLY 100,000 PASSENGERS THAT  
20101221140629.000|20101221140629.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN STRANDED.             
20101221140629.000|20101221140631.000|CC1|THAT BACKLOG IS GOING TO LAST   
20101221140631.000|20101221140632.000|CC1|THROUGH CHRISTMAS.

20101221140634.000|20101221140636.000|CC1|HEATHROW ALONE, BRU EUROPE IN

20101221145557.000|20101221145600.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20101221145600.000|20101221145600.000|CC1|    And if you wake up often    
20101221145600.000|20101221145603.000|CC1|  in the middle of the night... 
20101221145603.000|20101221145603.000|CC1|          rest is here,         
20101221145603.000|20101221145606.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20101221145606.000|20101221145606.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20101221145606.000|20101221145609.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20101221145609.000|20101221145609.000|CC1|           so you can           
20101221145609.000|20101221145612.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20101221145612.000|20101221145612.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20101221145612.000|20101221145615.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20101221145615.000|20101221145617.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20101221145617.000|20101221145617.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20101221145617.000|20101221145620.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20101221145620.000|20101221145620.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20101221145620.000|20101221145622.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20101221145622.000|20101221145623.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20101221145623.000|20101221145623.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20101221145623.000|20101221145626.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20101221145626.000|20101221145628.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20101221145628.000|20101221145628.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20101221145628.000|20101221145630.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20101221145630.000|20101221145630.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20101221145630.000|20101221145632.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20101221145632.000|20101221145632.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20101221145632.000|20101221145634.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20101221145634.000|20101221145634.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20101221145634.000|20101221145636.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20101221145636.000|20101221145638.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20101221145638.000|20101221145638.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20101221145638.000|20101221145640.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20101221145640.000|20101221145640.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20101221145640.000|20101221145642.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20101221145642.000|20101221145642.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta   
20101221145642.000|20101221145645.000|CC1|        is right for you.       
20101221145645.000|20101221145645.000|CC1|         Get Lunesta for        
20101221145645.000|20101221145649.000|CC1|   a $0 CO-PAY at Lunesta.com.  
20101221145649.000|20101221145649.000|CC1|    Sleep well, on the wings    
20101221145649.000|20101221145701.000|CC1|           of Lunesta.
